thread.title: Ben's Duchess wins LA Woman Stakes at Santa Anita
thread.title_full: Ben's Duchess wins LA Woman Stakes at Santa Anita - Yahoo Sports

author: yahoo
title: Ben's Duchess wins LA Woman Stakes at Santa Anita
text:
Done . View gallery
In this image provided by Benoit Photo, Ben's Duchess and jockey Joseph Talamo return to the winner's … View gallery In this image provided by Benoit Photo, Ben's Duchess and jockey Joseph Talamo win the Grade III … ARCADIA, Calif. (AP) -- Ben's Duchess went five-wide turning for home and went on to a 3 1/4-length victory in the $100,000 LA Woman Stakes for fillies and mares Sunday at Santa Anita.
Ridden by Joe Talamo, Ben's Duchess ran six furlongs in 1:15.79 and paid $19.60, $8 and $3.20 at 8-1 odds. It was the 3-year-old filly's first graded stakes victory.
Uzziel returned $5.40 and $2.40, while 3-5 favorite Taris was another half-length back in third and paid $2.10 to show in the Grade 3 race.
The victory, worth $60,000, increased Ben's Duchess' career earnings to $222,936, with four wins in nine starts for trainer John Sadler.
''I was smiling as I saw the race play out in front of me,'' said Talamo, just back from New York, where he won the Grade 2 Kelso at Belmont with Appealing Tale on Saturday. ''I kept her back and to the outside because the kickback was a little heavy. I came into the turn and I had so much horse.''
Sports & Recreation Horse Racing Joe Talamo   585/56818   518/85227   28/4545
